name: Find my friend (LoveTianTian)
description:
This is a 3D plot-oriented game. The movement of the pig is controlled by the WASD keys of the keyboard, and the change of perspective is controlled by the mouse. After talking with different friends, determine the location of the item you are looking for, and the game ends after picking up the item.

How to Play

Movement: WASD

Change  perspective: mouse

Conversation : Get close to the NPC to start the dialogue, click to start the dialogue
